data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Thinking concrete and cement are the same thing is common because they are often used interchangeably. However, ____ the ____ of ____ they ____ two ____ different ____. Concrete ____ made ____ a combination ____ water, ____, gravel, ____, and ____. It ____ often ____ to ____ walls. Cement is used to harden a mixture of crushed rock, sand, water, and other materials to create concrete.

Cement is used to harden a mixture of crushed rock, sand, water, and other materials to create concrete.
data.answer: 认为混凝土和水泥是同一种东西很常见，因为它们经常互换使用。然而，在建筑世界中，它们是两种截然不同的材料。混凝土由水、沙子、砾石、岩石和水泥混合而成。它经常被用来做墙。水泥是用来硬化碎石、沙子、水和其他材料的混合物来制造混凝土的。
